description: Updates user details within the  UpdateUserRequestItem object for up to 20 users for the specified Amazon Chime account. Currently, only LicenseType updates are supported for this action.

parameters.name: UpdateUserRequestItems
parameters.description: The request containing the user IDs and details to update. (dict) --- The user ID and user fields to update, used with the  BatchUpdateUser action. The user ID. LicenseType (string) --- The user license type. UserType (string) --- The user type. AlexaForBusinessMetadata (dict) --- The Alexa for Business metadata. IsAlexaForBusinessEnabled (boolean) --- Starts or stops Alexa for Business. AlexaForBusinessRoomArn (string) --- The ARN of the room resource.

nested_params.name: IsAlexaForBusinessEnabled
nested_params.description: Starts or stops Alexa for Business.

nested_params.name: AlexaForBusinessRoomArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the room resource.

nested_items.name: UserErrors
nested_items.description: If the  BatchUpdateUser action fails for one or more of the user IDs in the request, a list of the user IDs is returned, along with error codes and error messages.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The user ID for which the action failed.
